conversation_0: ^portrait: hood_neutral_1, You want to have your fortunes read?

c-0: ^portrait: hood_neutral_1, Your fortunes are etched on the lid of your eye
^portrait: hood_neutral_1, Close them and you will see it

conversation_1: ^portrait: hood_neutral_1, You want to have your fortunes read?

c-0: ^portrait: hood_neutral_1, Walking in there night after night in the dark.
^portrait: hood_neutral_1, You say you do not know it?
^portrait: hood_neutral_1, Close your eyes and you will see it
c-1: ^portrait: hood_neutral_1, You don't need me to tell you, do you?

conversation_2: ^portrait: hood_neutral_1, You want to have your fortunes read?

c-0: ^portrait: hood_neutral_1, Our magical thinker wants a fortune read
^portrait: hood_neutral_1, Why don't you read your own fortune and make it come true?
^portrait: hood_neutral_1, Are you capable of such a feat?
c-1: ^portrait: hood_neutral_1, You've seen the ending before you began the story

conversation_3: ^portrait: hood_neutral_1, You want to have your fortunes read?
^Wait, can you tell me what's the deal with the candle in the bottom room?

c-0: ^portrait: hood_neutral_1, A child at a birthday party tried making a wish yet forgot to blow out the candle
^portrait: hood_neutral_1, They stayed there, making the wish. For minutes, hours, weeks.
^portrait: hood_neutral_1, By the time they opened their eyes, the candle was as tall as the room
^portrait: hood_neutral_1, And no one in the world could blow it out

conversation_4_plus: ^portrait: hood_neutral_1, Do you know the secret of being a good fortune teller

c-0: ^portrait: hood_neutral_1, To know that things that happen never stop happening.
